name: Kick the Word! (BETA)
description:
Get ready for an intergalactic adventure with our new game! As you step into the cockpit of your spaceship, you'll find yourself immersed in a thrilling battle against enemy forces. They're approaching fast, but you're equipped with the latest technology to take them down.

The enemy ships are marked with words, and your mission is to type those words as quickly and accurately as possible while simultaneously shooting them down. You have the power to set the speed of the game to match your skills, so you can choose to take on this challenge at your own pace or ramp up the difficulty for an even greater adrenaline rush.

With 12 levels to conquer, each one more difficult than the last, you'll need to stay sharp to make it through the final boss battles at the end of each chapter. But don't worry, we've got your back. As you progress through the levels, you'll unlock new weapons and upgrades that will help you take down the toughest foes.

This is the first beta version of the game, and we're excited to share it with you. By downloading the game, you'll accept the user agreement contained within and join the battle for the fate of the galaxy. We're constantly working on updates to make the game even better, so stay tuned for new challenges and features.

Are you ready to become a hero of the galaxy? Download our game now and join the fight!

Don't forget to donate to support our game!

Please read the license agreement before downloading.
